page.title: 09FARMING IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: Mr.D.Luther,tenant farmer of{MOORTOWN {COTTAGE,}has 40-50acres,25% arable,75% beef cattle.The land is owned partly by Lord Wimborne,partly by Bournemouth & Poole councils.{BLACKWATER FARM}is a freehold smallholding,15acres,owned & worked by Mr.Waters.{ASHINGTON FARM}is llacres enriched grazing farmed byten- ant farmer John Whiffen.{MOORTOWN FARM has recently been sold,the farmhouse is now 2 dwellings,farm buildings an equestrian centre,fields sold to an outside farm.{NURSERIES.}(3,all free- hold){BEECROFT}5acres owned by Mr& Mrs Soffe for 12 yrs.{GRAVEL HILL}4 acres, owned by Mr.& Mrs.Williams.Both are general growing & retailing nurseries. {BROADBOURNE.}Owned by Mr.Fred Titmus for l5 yrs,is a 3.5acre nursery spec- ialising in polyanthus & 6acre equest- rian centre.The latter is at present not in use.
